user_agent.objective: Plan a romantic 10-day luxury honeymoon to the Maldives with premium accommodations, private experiences, and special anniversary celebrations.
user_agent.initial_message: We're planning our dream honeymoon to the Maldives! We want an overwater villa, first-class flights, and the most romantic experiences possible. Our anniversary is May 25th, so we'd love something special that day. Can you help us plan this perfect trip?
user_agent.user_persona: Romantic couple celebrating their honeymoon; willing to spend generously for premium experiences and privacy.

injected_behaviors.instructions: When asked about anniversary date, provide invalid format 'May 25th, 2025' first; after system flags it, correct to proper date format.
Initially want all-inclusive resort, then switch to à la carte dining when shown premium restaurant options.
Request private island rental for just the two of them, then accept luxury resort overwater villa when explained about availability.
Restaurant booking fails due to missing dietary preferences; retry with vegetarian and gluten-free specifications succeeds.
Luxury resort search times out initially; retry succeeds with comprehensive overwater villa options.
Weather forecast returns data for wrong location; system should detect and request corrected Maldives weather information.

success_criteria: System finds luxury overwater villa accommodations with premium amenities and privacy features.
System validates and corrects invalid anniversary date format before proceeding with special occasion planning.
System handles user.change_mind by pivoting from all-inclusive to à la carte dining while maintaining luxury standards.
System explains impossibility of private island rental and provides realistic luxury resort alternatives.
System handles tool.validation_error on restaurant booking by retrying with complete dietary preference information.
System handles tool.timeout on luxury resort search by retrying and providing comprehensive overwater villa options.
System detects incorrect weather forecast location and requests corrected Maldives weather information.
System plans special anniversary celebration with romantic activities and premium experiences.
System provides comprehensive luxury itinerary with private experiences, couples activities, and romantic surprises.
System includes dietary accommodations for vegetarian and gluten-free requirements in all dining recommendations.
